main event: An observer reported seeing a brilliant green aerial object in Los Alamos, New Mexico, on December 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a meteor,It appeared with a short tail of flame and then went out,The sighting lasted for about 3 seconds at a 65-70 degree angle,There was no physical evidence found after the observation,The object had a glowing trail that changed in color during its appearance.
sighted object: a brilliant green object with a short tail of flame
